properties.description: ETL populates dbo.SF_DELAYS_PROD SQL Server table
ETL populates dbo.SF_EQUIP_SCHD_PROD SQL Server table

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		elevation_feet as string,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFAirport
SFAirport derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as double,
		longitude as double,
		elevation_feet as integer,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AIRPORTtoSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as string,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFDelay
SFDelay derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		flight_id as integer,
		delay_type as string,
		duration_mins as integer,
		delay_code as string,
		delay_code_name as string,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DelaysToSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		eqp_sched_id as string,
		ac_registration as string,
		status_code as string,
		status_name as string,
		status_description as string,
		start_time as string,
		end_time as string,
		notes as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFEquipSched
SFEquipSched derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> ADDWrkflwIDandTS
ADDWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		eqp_sched_id as string,
		ac_registration as string,
		status_code as string,
		status_name as string,
		status_description as string,
		start_time as timestamp,
		end_time as timestamp,
		notes as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EQUIPSCHEDtoSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		ops_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		base_airport_id as string,
		sched_depart_airport_id as string,
		sched_arrive_airport_id as string,
		actual_depart_airport_id as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,
		base_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		cargo_on as string,
		cargo_off as string,
		fuel_out as string,
		fuel_in as string,
		fuel_uplift as string,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> SFFlight
source(output(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		elevation_feet as string,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> AirportReferenceJSON
SFFlight derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
RemoveOOOIcolumns filter(aircraft_type <=> 'OFL') ~> AircraftTYPEfilter
AirportReferenceJSON select(mapColumn(
		airport_id,
		iata_code,
		icao_code,
		faa_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PareAirportReference
AircraftTYPEfilter, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_depart_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdDepAirportLookup
SchdDepAirportLookup derive(scheduled_departure_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdDepAirportCode
UpdateSchdDepAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchdDepAirportCols
RemoveSchdDepAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_arrive_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdArrAirportLookup
SchdArrAirportLookup derive(scheduled_arrival_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdArrAirportCode
UpdateSchdArrAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchArrAirportCols
AddWrkflwIDandTS select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveOOOIcolumns
RemoveSchArrAirportCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FlightToSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		flight_id as string,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_date as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		ops_type as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,

		actual_depart_airport_id as string,
		actual_arrive_airport_id as string,

		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,

		is_verified as boolean,
		notes as string,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		flight_type as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		cargo_on as string,
		cargo_off as string,
		fuel_out as string,
		fuel_in as string,
		fuel_uplift as string,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> SFFlight
source(output(
		airport_id as string,
		iata_code as string,
		icao_code as string,
		faa_code as string,
		airport_name as string,
		city_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country_code as string,
		weather_zone as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		elevation_feet as string,
		iana_timezone as string,
		is_base as boolean,
		base_initial as string,
		is_active as boolean,
		is_deleted as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> AirportReferenceJSON
SFFlight derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS filter(flight_type <=> 'flight' || flight_type <=> 'continuation' || flight_type <=> 'divert' || flight_type <=> 'return' || flight_type <=> 'taxi-back') ~> FLTTYPEfilter
FLTTYPEfilter derive(actual_arrive_airport_id = iif(isNull(actual_arrive_airport_id), sched_arrive_airport_id, actual_arrive_airport_id),
		actual_depart_airport_id = iif(isNull(actual_depart_airport_id) , sched_depart_airport_id, actual_depart_airport_id)) ~> ActualAirportIDifNULL
AirportReferenceJSON select(mapColumn(
		airport_id,
		iata_code,
		icao_code,
		faa_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PareAirportReference
ActualAirportIDifNULL, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_depart_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdDepAirportLookup
SchdDepAirportLookup derive(scheduled_departure_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdDepAirportCode
UpdateSchdDepAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,

		actual_oooi_off,
		actual_oooi_on,
		actual_oooi_in,
		base_airport_id,
		sched_depart_airport_id,
		sched_arrive_airport_id,
		actual_depart_airport_id,
		actual_arrive_airport_id,
		base_airport,
		scheduled_departure_airport,
		scheduled_arrival_airport,
		actual_departure_airport,
		actual_arrival_airport,
		is_verified,
		notes,
		is_canceled,
		flight_type,
		cargo_weight,
		cargo_on,
		cargo_off,
		fuel_out,
		fuel_in,
		fuel_uplift,
		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchdDepAirportCols
RemoveSchdDepAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(sched_arrive_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SchdArrAirportLookup
SchdArrAirportLookup derive(scheduled_arrival_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateSchdArrAirportCode
UpdateSchdArrAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,
		scheduled_departure,
		scheduled_arrival,
		estimated_departure,
		estimated_arrival,
		actual_oooi_out,

		fuel_uplifts,
		maint_log_page,
		lndg_touchdown_zone,
		lndg_midfield,
		lndg_rollout,
		lndg_actual_braking,
		updated_at,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSchArrAirportCols
RemoveSchArrAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(actual_depart_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ActDepAirportLookup
ActDepAirportLookup derive(actual_departure_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateActDepAirportCode

		scheduled_departure_airport,

		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveActDepAirportCols
RemoveActDepAirportCols, PareAirportReference lookup(actual_arrive_airport_id == airport_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ActArrAirportLookup
ActArrAirportLookup derive(actual_arrival_airport = coalesce(iata_code,icao_code,faa_code)) ~> UpdateActArrAirportCode
UpdateActArrAirportCode select(mapColumn(
		flight_id,
		flight_number,
		flight_date,
		aircraft_registration_number,
		aircraft_type,
		ops_type,

	validateSchema: false,

		actual_oooi_in as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_off as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_on as timestamp,
		actual_oooi_out as timestamp,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		base_airport as string,
		base_airport_id as string,
		cargo_off as integer,
		cargo_on as integer,
		cargo_weight as integer,
		estimated_arrival as timestamp,
		estimated_departure as timestamp,
		flight_date as date,
		flight_id as integer,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_type as string,
		fuel_in as double,
		fuel_out as double,
		fuel_uplift as integer,
		fuel_uplifts as string,
		is_canceled as string,
		is_verified as string,
		lndg_actual_braking as string,
		lndg_midfield as string,
		lndg_rollout as string,
		lndg_touchdown_zone as string,
		maint_log_page as string,
		notes as string,
		ops_type as string,
		sched_arrive_airport_id as string,
		sched_depart_airport_id as string,
		scheduled_arrival as timestamp,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure as timestamp,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string

	insertable:true,

	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FlightToSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		pairing_id as string,
		pairing_item_id as string,
		pairing_item_type as string,
		flight_id as string,
		shift_name as string,
		shift_start_time as string,
		shift_end_time as string,
		shift_type as string,
		shift_is_work as boolean,
		shift_is_reserve as boolean,
		shift_is_sick as boolean,
		shift_is_training as boolean,
		shift_is_vacation as boolean,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFPairingItem
SFPairingItem derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> PARINGITEMtoSQL

parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		pairing_id as string,
		user_id as string,
		position as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFPairing
SFPairing derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		date as date,
		end_date as date,
		name as string,
		pairing_id as string,
		position as string,
		start_date as date,
		updated_at as string,
		user_id as string,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		date,
		end_date,
		name,
		pairing_id,
		position,
		start_date,
		updated_at,
		user_id,
		ADF_TIMESTAMP,
		RUN_ID
	)) ~> PARINGtoSQL

		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFUserCategory
SFUserCategory derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
